title: Implement Wordless Tutorial W1-4
description: Hand-script tutorial waves with gated mechanics: W1=move W2=dodge W3=powerups W4=roll

title: Reduce to 2 Planes for v1
description: Remove Falcon and Lancer from PLANES array. Ship only Specter + Atlas per design doc

title: Add Movement Velocity Smoothing
description: Track player.vx/vy and lerp toward target speed for ~4 frame accel / ~6 frame decel

title: Fix Score Values to Design Doc
description: Set small=100 medium=250 mini boss=5000 final boss=25000. Add floating score pop text at kills

title: Add Wave Clear Transitions and Boss Warning
description: Show WAVE CLEAR text 90 frames + score bonus. Add 180-frame WARNING phase before bosses

title: Make Bombs Feel Powerful
description: Add 60-frame I-frames. Kill normals outright. Full-screen flash. 10pts per cancelled bullet

title: Remove NOT- Prefix from Campaign Names/IDs
description: Find-replace in campaigns.js and dialogue.js to remove not_/NOT- prefixes

title: Differentiate Enemy vs Player Bullet Visuals
description: Draw enemy bullets as diamonds/circles with white core. Keep player bullets rectangular

title: Add Death Consequences
description: Reset all buff timers on death. Add 30-frame entity freeze + screen shake. Drop shot tier

title: Simplify Campaign Intro Phase
description: Remove campaign_intro phase. Add 3-second black screen with campaign name between campaigns

title: Implement Unique Campaign Structures
description: C2: boss W3/double W10. C3: no minis. C4: bosses W4/W8/W12/W16. Custom 20-wave arrays

title: Implement Boss Hit Zones
description: Split boss HP into 4 sections (port/starboard battery engine core). Phase transitions on section destruction

title: Implement Signature Moments
description: Start with whale crossing C1 + ambush from all edges C2 + wingman C4

title: Implement Chain Scoring System
description: Track chainCount/chainTimer. Shrinking window 90→45 frames. Display chain multiplier prominently

title: Add Focus Mode
description: Hold-Space: 1.5px/f speed + visible 3px hitbox dot. Tie to graze scoring

title: World Reacts to Player Actions
description: Darken background on bomb. Boss death triggers ambient event. C4 lightning gameplay-relevant

title: Implement Distinct Enemy Bullet Patterns
description: Per-enemy bullet behaviors: fighters=aimed gunships=burst bombers=slow drops. Color-code by speed tier

title: Implement Graze System
description: 28px graze hitbox. 25pts × chain per graze. Spark particles + crystalline sound

title: Integrate Bomb with Scoring System
description: Bomb resets chain to 0 (cost). Cancelled bullets award 10pts each. Add 90-frame I-frames

title: Implement Roll Stock System
description: Replace cooldown with 3 stocks + 10s regen. Display as icons

title: Add 1-Up Score Milestones
description: 1-up at 100k then every 200k. Max 5 lives. Distinctive sound + 1-UP text
